name_localized.en: Standard Double or Twin Room, Accessible
name_localized.es: Standard Double or Twin Room, Accessible

short_description_localized.en: Standard Double or Twin Room, Accessible
short_description_localized.es: Standard Double or Twin Room, Accessible

description_localized.en:
1 Double Bed or 1 Twin Bed
129 sq feet (12 sq meters)

Internet - WiFi and wired Internet access
Entertainment - 20-inch LCD TV with satellite channels and pay movies
Food & Drink - Room service and minibar
Sleep - Select Comfort bed, premium bedding, and turndown service
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower, free toiletries, and a hair dryer
Practical - Safe and desk
Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Smoking/Non Smoking
